title: Visualize the Carbon Atom
text: Take a close look at the bonds around the highlighted carbon atom. How many atoms are connected, and what does the geometry suggest?

title: Count the Bonds
text: How many sigma and pi bonds are around the highlighted carbon? What does this imply about the hybridization?

title: Hybridization Clues
text: Consider what type of hybrid orbitals the highlighted carbon might use, given the surrounding atoms and bonds.

title: Consider Molecular Geometry
text: What shape is associated with the sp2 hybridization?
